description: This file defines a mock class 'ServiceMock' for testing purposes, implementing the interface 'WPEFramework::PluginHost::IShell' with mocked methods using Google Mock. It is used to facilitate unit testing of components that depend on the 'IShell' interface in the 'app-gateway' project.

classes.name: ServiceMock
classes.description: A mock implementation of the 'WPEFramework::PluginHost::IShell' interface for testing.

methods.name: AddRef
methods.description: Mocked method for increasing the reference count.

methods.name: Release
methods.description: Mocked method for decreasing the reference count.

methods.name: Activate
methods.description: Activates the service with a reason, returns a result code.

methods.name: Deactivate
methods.description: Deactivates the service with a reason, returns a result code.

methods.name: Unavailable
methods.description: Marks the service as unavailable with a reason, returns a result code.

methods.name: Resumed
methods.description: Returns whether the service has been resumed.

methods.name: Background
methods.description: Returns whether the service runs in the background.

methods.name: Reason
methods.description: Returns the reason for a callback or event.
